title: Joining KPMG as Technology Risk Consultant
preview: This summer, I started a new chapter at KPMG Canada as a Technology Risk Consultant, working on software security and risk management solutions.
fullText:
This summer, I started a new chapter at KPMG Canada as a Technology Risk Consultant, working on developing and implementing risk management solutions.

As a Technology Risk Consultant, I'm evaluating enterprise applications, analyzing IT infrastructure, identifying system vulnerabilities, and helping organizations improve their risk controls.
